sentences.en: A brown and blue palette gives this dining room a contemporary aesthetic.
sentences.cn: 棕色和蓝色的染料让这个餐厅展现出现代美学的精髓.

sentences.en: An all - in - one palette containing 2 concealers, 2 eye shadows and 1 blush.
sentences.cn: 它包含了2款遮瑕膏, 2款自然眼影和1款胭脂.

sentences.en: Before painting on paper, can be mixed on the palette color.
sentences.cn: 之前画在纸上, 可混合在面板的颜色.

sentences.en: David Fincher paints from a palette consisting almost exclusively of grey and mud brown.
sentences.cn: 戴维·芬彻几乎只用灰色和土褐色作画。

sentences.en: Greens and browns are typical of Ribera's palette.
sentences.cn: 绿色和棕色是里贝拉的主色调。

sentences.en: He picked his brushes and palette.
I painted in the walls with the palette knife.
sentences.cn: 我使用调色板刮刀绘制了墙壁.

sentences.en: Keep the color palette narrow and conservative.
sentences.cn: 不要用太多的颜色,并且使用这些颜色时要保守.

sentences.en: Probably he would lay down his brushes and palette.
sentences.cn: 也许他会放下画笔和调色板.

sentences.en: Select the red head shape and choose Overlay in the Transparency Palette.
sentences.cn: 选择红色的头部形状,并选择在重叠的透明度,调色盘.

sentences.en: Starry , starry night , paint your palette blue and gray.
sentences.cn: 星夜下调色板上只有蓝与灰.

sentences.en: The Component palette page where you want it to appear.
sentences.cn: 用户定义组件所在的组件栏上的页.

sentences.en: The painter's right hand holds the brush, the left the palette.
sentences.cn: 那位画家的右手握着画笔，左手拿着调色盘。

sentences.en: There are two basic variants of palette tool behavior: modal tools and charged cursor tools.
sentences.cn: 它们的行为有两种基本类型,即模态工具和加载的光标工具.

sentences.en: Unable to set the image palette to the specified value.
sentences.cn: 无法将图像调色板设置为指定值.

sentences.en: Use the Pencil tool, select 1 px brush from the palette.
sentences.cn: 用铅笔工具, 在选项栏上选择1像素的笔刷.

trans.tran_en: a thin curved board that an artist uses to mix paints, holding it by putting his or her thumb through a hole at the edge
